other_title: Space Battleship Yamato 2 - The Comet Empire
plot: Peace has reigned on Earth, for awhile now, and now the Earth Defense Force has been upgraded quite extensively after the Earth was saved from radioactive decay at the hands of the Gamilon empire. But danger is yet again approaching in the form of a giant, white comet.
ending_theme: "Teresa yo towani (Teresa Forever)" by Isao Sasaki and Feeling Free
